mapper.select:
SELECT a.ACCNT_NM, a.ACCNT_NO, a.ACC_YEAR, a.BANK_DIV, a.NOTE, a.USE_YN, B.ACNT_CD AS acntCd, B.ACNT_NM AS acntNm, E.ASSI_TYPE_CD AS assiTypeCd, E.ASSI_TYPE_Nm AS assiTypeNm FROM AE_ACCNT_NO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM AE_ACC_ACNT WHERE ACC_YEAR=#{accYear} ) B ON A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM AE_ASSI_TYPE WHERE ACC_YEAR=#{accYear} ) E ON A.ASSI_TYPE_CD = E.ASSI_TYPE_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.ACC_YEAR = #{accYear}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AE_ACCNT_NO( ACNT_CD, ASSI_TYPE_CD, ACCNT_NO, BANK_DIV, USE_YN, NOTE, ACC_YEAR, ACCNT_NM ) VALUES ( #{acntCd }, #{assiTypeCd}, #{accntNo }, #{bankDiv }, #{useYn }, #{note }, #{accYear }, #{accntNm } )
mapper.update: UPDATE AE_ACCNT_NO SET ACNT_CD =#{acntCd }, ASSI_TYPE_CD=#{assiTypeCd}, BANK_DIV =#{bankDiv }, USE_YN =#{useYn }, NOTE =#{note }, ACCNT_NM =#{accntNm } WHERE ACCNT_NO=#{accntNo} AND ACC_YEAR=#{accYear}
